meanings.sent1: She looked at him poutingly when he refused to share his toy.
meanings.sent2: She walked away poutingly after not getting the dessert she wanted.
meanings.sent3: Her cat pouted poutingly when she stopped petting him.
meanings.sent4: The clouds moved poutingly across the sky, threatening rain.
meanings.sent5: The child stared poutingly at the closed ice cream shop, wishing it would open.

meanings.definition: Showing displeasure or sulkiness by protruding the lips
meanings.sent1: The poutingly child refused to speak to anyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: She gave him a poutingly look when he teased her about her new haircut.
meanings.sent3: The puppy looked poutingly at the empty food bowl, hoping for a refill.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a poutingly appearance with its peeling paint and sagging roof.
meanings.sent5: Her poutingly expression made it clear she was not happy with the situation.
